hero.title: legal-expand
hero.subtitle: Smart expansion of Spanish legal acronyms
hero.description: TypeScript library that automatically expands legal acronyms in Spanish legal texts, facilitating understanding of complex documents.

demo.title: Interactive demo
demo.placeholder: Type or paste your legal text here...

students.title: Law Students
students.description: Understand complex legal texts without constantly consulting glossaries.

oppositors.title: Competitive Exam Candidates
oppositors.description: Prepare exams with clear terminology and save time.

academies.title: Academies and Universities
academies.description: Integrate into educational platforms for more accessible materials.

law_firms.title: Law Firms
law_firms.description: Speed up document review and onboard junior associates.

public_admin.title: Public Administration
public_admin.description: Clarify citizen communications and reduce queries.

developers.title: Developers
developers.description: Integrate into legal applications and LLM analysis APIs.

api.title: API reference
api.expand_description: Expands legal acronyms found in the provided text.
api.config_global_description: Sets global configuration that applies to all expansions.
api.reset_config_description: Restores the global configuration to default values.
api.search_description: Searches for a specific acronym in the dictionary. Returns null if it doesn't exist.
api.list_description: Returns all available acronyms in the dictionary.
api.formatters_intro: Extensible formatter system. You can create custom formatters:
api.register_formatter_description: Registers a custom formatter in the system.
api.duplicates_intro: Some acronyms can have multiple meanings. The system offers several ways to resolve these duplicates.
api.duplicates_method1_description: Specify which meaning to use for ambiguous acronyms in each call:
api.duplicates_method2_description: The system will automatically choose the meaning with highest priority:
api.duplicates_method3_description: To permanently modify which meaning has preference, edit the file
api.priority_very_high: Very high priority (most common terms in law)
api.context_protection_intro: The engine automatically avoids expanding acronyms in special contexts:
